posts.caption: The Next Evolution of Agile Leadership Roles
posts.description:
This month's meetup is different! We are hosting Dr. Ahmed Sidky, one of the International thought leaders in agile, who is visiting Egypt for two weeks. Ahmed will share with us his insights about Agile Leadership, and many other topics.  

Here is the Agenda:

• 6:30 - 7:00 Registration

• 7:00 - 7:40 Presentation by Dr. Ahmed Sidky: "Agile Project Manager, Product Owner and ScrumMaster are all broken - The Next Evolution of Agile Leadership Roles"

• 7:45 - 8:15 Break

• 8:15 - 9:30 Panel Discussion featuring Agile Academy founders: Ahmed Sidky, Amr Noaman, and Mohamed Amr. 

Topic Description: Agile Project Manager, Product Owner and ScrumMaster are all broken - The Next Evolution of Agile Leadership Roles 

Riot Games has developed and published League of Legends; an online multiplayer real-time strategy game that has more than 67 million active players per month and 27 million per day. At Riot Games, we have created a framework of explicitly identifying and assigning roles and responsibilities, or “hats” each person might “wear” on a team. 

This framework acknowledges and embraces the fact that everyone has different strengths and weaknesses, and therefore it doesn’t try to fit a person into a predefined role. Instead, it recognises the strength of the team as a whole, and crafts roles to cater to existing team composition. It works within any methodology - it doesn’t matter if you are using Scrum, Kanban or Waterfall. Teams tend to love the framework because it gamifies the discussions, clarifies responsibilities and empowers ownership for the team itself. It makes accountability clear, and also helps think through all aspects of being a high-performing team. 
In this talk, Ahmed will share the framework and the exercises that attendees can immediately apply with their teams. 


About Ahmed Sidky (Dr. Agile): 

Ahmed Sidky is a well-known global thought-leader in the Agile community. He combines over 20 years of software development experience with research from his Ph.D. in Agile transformation to help leaders and knowledge workers BE Agile (rather than just "do" agile). 
Ahmed joined Riot Games in 2014 as Head of Development Management. Prior to Riot, Ahmed worked with a variety of Fortune 100 companies (Verizon, Caterpillar, Nationwide, Booz Allen Hamilton, and many more), guiding their enterprise agile transformations and educating their leaders on using the agile mindset to create lean, high-performing teams and learning organizations. 
Ahmed joined Riot Games in 2014 as Head of Development Management. Prior to Riot, Ahmed worked with a variety of Fortune 100 companies (Verizon, Caterpillar, Nationwide, Booz Allen Hamilton, and many more), guiding their enterprise agile transformations and educating their leaders on using the agile mindset to create lean, high-performing teams and learning organizations. 

About Agile Academy

Agile Academy is a leading organization is Agile training, coaching and consultation in Egypt and the Middle East. Agile Academy is the only accredited organization by the International Consortium of Agile (ICAgile) in the area, and offers over 10 different internationally recognized certifications, as well as coaching, consultation, and Enterprise transformation services in agile software development.

Agile Academy was co-founded by two of the leading contributors to the agile community in Egypt since 2009: Amr Noaman and Mohamed Amr,  with Dr. Ahmed Sidky, as an advisory board member.

Fees & Registration

The meetup is sponsored by Agile Academy and is free of charge. However, the seats are very limited. So, please hurry up and RSVP in the event

Registration Page 
http://www.agileacademy.co/wpgforms/the-next-evolution-of-agile-leadership-roles/

posts.message: Anyone here with experience in #Android #UnitTesting using #Dagger can help me please?

مساء الخير، وعيد سعيد عليكم 
دلوقتي انا بواجه مشكله رخمة أوي، الكمبيوتر بتاعي قررت أنضفه عشان اللي عايش مع كلاب وقطط هيبقي عارف كمية الشعر اللي بتدخل فيه. 
المهم فكيت البوردة ونضفتها من التراب بهوا وبشوية قطن مسحت التراب. 
لما ركبته وجيت أشغله بتجيلي الرسالة دي وبيعملي ريستارت بعد ٣ ثواني بالكتير. 
مفيش أوبشن إني أدخل على ال BIOS ومفيش أوبشن إني أعمل حاجة بالكيبورد. 

دورت على حلول كتير بقالي يومين ومش لاقي حل سليم نفع معايا. 
حد واجهته المشكلة دي قبل كده ؟

ملحوظة:
(الكمبيوتر عليه ويندوز ١٠ و GIGABYTE GA-H81M-S2PH )
شيلت البطارية كتير وركبتها ومفيش جديد بردو . 

ياريت لو حد عنده حل
